component.name: Aerosols
component.definition: Definition of component type Aerosols required

parameter.name: AerosolSchemeScope
parameter.definition: Atmospheric domains covered by the aerosol model.

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Decription of the basic approximations made in the Aerosol model.

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: Prognostic variables of the aerosol model.

parameter.name: NumberOfTracers
parameter.definition: Number of tracers in the aerosol model.

parameter.name: FamilyApproach
parameter.definition: Aerosol calculations are generalised into families of species.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Mathematical method deployed to solve the time evolution of the prognostic variables.

value.name: uses AtmosphericChemistry time stepping
value.definition: Aerosol model uses the same time-stepping framework as the one of the Atmospheric chemistry model.

value.name: specific time stepping (operator splitting)
value.definition: The Aerosol model use its own time-step and all the processes are decoupled; the time evolution is calculated sequentially and the tendencies are cumulated.

value.name: specific time stepping (integrated)
value.definition: The Aerosol model uses its own time-step and all the processes having an impact on the time evolution are taken into account and solved simultaneously.

constraint.name: if Method is "specific time stepping (operator splitting)"

parameter.name: AdvectionTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for aerosols advection.

parameter.name: PhysicalTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for aerosols physics.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for the aerosol model.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Specify the type of time step scheme.

component.name: AerosolTransport
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolTransport required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method for aerosol transport modeling (different or not from Atmospheric Chemistry one).

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: The type of Aerosol transport scheme.

parameter.name: MassConservation
parameter.definition: Method used to ensure mass conservation.

value.name: mass adjustment
value.definition: Adjustment is required to conserve mass.

value.name: gradients monotony
value.definition: Sharp gradients in concentration are smoothed.

parameter.name: Convection
parameter.definition: Transport by convection.

value.name: vertical velocities connected to tracers
value.definition: Mass flux vertical velocities are connected with tracers.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used for turbulence parametrization (different or not from the one of Atmospheric Chemistry?).

value.name: use same turbulence scheme as AtmosphericChemistry

parameter.name: Scheme
parameter.definition: description of the scheme used for parametrization of the turbulent transport of aerosols.

component.name: AerosolEmissionAndConc
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolEmissionAndConc required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define aerosol species emitted at the surface (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

parameter.name: SourceTypes
parameter.definition: Sources of aerosols emitted at the surface that are taken into account in the emissions scheme.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type for aerosols emissions prescribed at the surface.

parameter.name: ClimEmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted at the surface and prescribed via a climatology.

parameter.name: UniformEmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted at the surface and prescribed as spatially uniform.

parameter.name: InteractivEmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted at the surface and specified via an interactive method.

parameter.name: MethodCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Characteristics of the method used for aerosol emissions at the surface.

parameter.name: EmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted at the surface and specified via the method described above.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define aerosol species emitted in the atmosphere (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

parameter.name: SourceTypes
parameter.definition: Sources of aerosols emitted in the atmosphere that are taken into account in the emissions scheme.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type for aerosols emissions prescribed in the atmosphere.

parameter.name: ClimEmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted in the atmosphere and prescribed via a climatology.

parameter.name: UniformEmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted in the atmosphere and prescribed as spatially uniform.

parameter.name: InteractivEmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted in the atmosphere and specified via an interactive method.

parameter.name: MethodCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Characteristics of the method used for aerosol emissions in the atmosphere.

parameter.name: EmittedSpecies
parameter.definition: List of aerosol species emitted in the atmosphere and specified via the method described above.

parameter.name: PrescribedLowerBoundary
parameter.definition: List of species prescribed at the lower boundary.

parameter.name: PrescribedUpperBoundary
parameter.definition: List of species prescribed at the upper boundary.

component.name: AerosolModel
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolModel required

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Processes included in the Aerosol model.

parameter.name: CouplingWith
parameter.definition: Other model components coupled to the Aerosol model. This is covered more completely by the coupling archictecture in the questionnaire.

parameter.name: GasPhasePrecursors
parameter.definition: List of gas phase aerosol precursors.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type(s) of aerosol scheme used by the aerosols model (potentially multiple: some species may be covered by one type of aerosol scheme and other species covered by another type).

parameter.name: BulkSpecies
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the bulk scheme.

parameter.name: ModalFramework
parameter.definition: Aerosols classification framework used in the modal aerosol scheme.

value.name: single moment
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol.

value.name: microphysical
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of size bins/modes. Microphysical scheme resolves the composition rather than the type. Can have a mixture of aerosol components in a single bin/mode - so can have dust and sulphate in a single mode.

parameter.name: ModalSpecies
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the modal scheme.

parameter.name: BinFramework
parameter.definition: Aerosols classification framework used in the bin aerosol scheme.

value.name: single moment
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol.

value.name: microphysical
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of size bins/modes. Microphysical scheme resolves the composition rather than the type. Can have a mixture of aerosol components in a single bin/mode - so can have dust and sulphate in a single mode.

parameter.name: BinSpecies
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the bin scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeCharacteritics
parameter.definition: Characteristics of the aerosol scheme used.

parameter.name: Framework
parameter.definition: Aerosols classification framework.

value.name: single moment
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol.

value.name: microphysical
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of size bins/modes. Microphysical scheme resolves the composition rather than the type. Can have a mixture of aerosol components in a single bin/mode - so can have dust and sulphate in a single mode.

parameter.name: Species
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the scheme.
